artist: Artist: Howard Hodgkin; Printer: Solo Press, New York; Publisher: Waddington Graphics, London
description: abstract image; four rainbow-like arcs--two with bright blue at top (also orange and yelow) of arcs at bottom of sheet, two with orange (also green and blue) at top of arcs at top of sheet; green around edges with an oval opening at center
markings: LRC, printer\'s blindstamp: (hand with index finger pointing up)
medium: Color lithograph with pochoir on buff paper
provenance: Dolly J. Fiterman, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2016.
title: Red Palm
